message: Fair 60-40 split, don't let inflation eat away your share!
I think a 60-40 split is more fair, considering inflation will impact my share in the next rounds. Let's get this done!
Considering the inflation, my share remains the same, but your share is decreasing. Take this before it's too late!
Let's split the money equally. With inflation, we'll both lose if we keep rejecting offers.
You're losing value fast, Bob. This is a better deal than equal split considering the inflation!
Let's try 60-40 again. While inflation is hurting me, I'm willing to compromise to avoid losing everything.
